Module org.nasdanika.common
Package org.nasdanika.common

Class ProgressRecorder

java.lang.Object
org.nasdanika.common.ProgressRecorder
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable, Composeable<ProgressMonitor>, ProgressMonitor
Direct Known Subclasses:
ProgressEntry
public class ProgressRecorder extends Object implements ProgressMonitor
Progress recorder storing progress information for subsequent processing or replaying.
Author:
Pavel
